00143     public function init()
00144     {
00145         //  Call daddy...
00146         parent::init();
00147 
00148         //  Attach our events...
00149         $this->attachEventHandler( 'onBeforeApiCall', array( $this, 'beforeApiCall' ) );
00150         $this->attachEventHandler( 'onAfterApiCall', array( $this, 'afterApiCall' ) );
00151         $this->attachEventHandler( 'onRequestComplete', array( $this, 'requestComplete' ) );
00152     }

00171     public function addRequestMapping( $label, $parameterName = null, $required = false, $options = array( ), $apiName = null, $subApiName = null )
00172     {
00173         //  Save for next call
00174         static $_lastApiName;
00175         static $_lastAction;
00176 
00177         //  Set up statics so next call can omit those parameters.
00178         if ( null !== $apiName && $apiName != $_lastApiName )
00179             $_lastApiName = $apiName;
00180 
00181         //  Make sure sub API name is set...
00182         if ( null === $_lastAction && null == $subApiName )
00183             $subApiName = '/';
00184 
00185         if ( null !== $subApiName && $subApiName != $_lastAction )
00186             $_lastAction = $subApiName;
00187 
00188         //  Build the options
00189         $_mapOptions = array(
00190             'name' => ( null !== $parameterName ) ? $parameterName : $label,
00191             'required' => $required
00192         );
00193 
00194         //  Add on any supplied options
00195         if ( !empty( $options ) )
00196             $_mapOptions = array_merge( $_mapOptions, $options );
00197 
00198         //  Add the mapping...
00199         if ( null == $_lastApiName && null == $_lastAction )
00200             return false;
00201 
00202         //  Add mapping...
00203         if ( null === $this->_requestMap )
00204             $this->_requestMap = array( );
00205 
00206         $this->_requestMap[ $_lastApiName ][ $_lastAction ][ $label ] = $_mapOptions;
00207 
00208         return true;
00209     }
00210 
00218     protected function makeRequest( $subType = '/', $requestData = null, $requestMethod = 'GET' )
00219     {
00220         //  Make sure apiQueryName is set...
00221         if ( $this->_requireApiQueryName && null === $this->_apiQueryName )
00222         {
00223             throw new CPSApiException(
00224                 Yii::t(
00225                     __CLASS__, 'Required option "apiQueryName" is not set.'
00226                 )
00227             );
00228         }
00229 
00230         //  Default...
00231         $_payload = $this->_requestData;
00232 
00233         //  Check data...
00234         if ( is_array( $requestData ) && !empty( $requestData ) )
00235             $_payload = array_merge( $_payload, $requestData );
00236 
00237         //  Check subtype...
00238         if ( !empty( $subType ) && is_array( $this->_requestMap[ $this->_apiToUse ] ) )
00239         {
00240             if ( !array_key_exists( $subType, $this->_requestMap[ $this->_apiToUse ] ) )
00241             {
00242                 throw new CPSApiException(
00243                     Yii::t(
00244                         __CLASS__, 'Invalid API SubType specified for "{apiToUse}". Valid subtypes are "{subTypes}"', array(
00245                         '{apiToUse}' => $this->_apiToUse,
00246                         '{subTypes}' => implode( ', ', array_keys( $this->_requestMap[ $this->_apiToUse ] ) )
00247                         )
00248                     )
00249                 );
00250             }
00251         }
00252 
00253         //  Build the url...
00254         $_url = rtrim( $this->_apiBaseUrl, '/' ) . '/';
00255 
00256         if ( isset( $this->_apiSubUrls[ $this->_apiToUse ] ) && '/' != $this->_apiSubUrls[ $this->_apiToUse ] )
00257             $_url .= $this->_apiSubUrls[ $this->_apiToUse ];
00258 
00259         //  Add the API key...
00260         if ( $this->_requireApiQueryName )
00261             $_queryString = $this->_apiQueryName . '=' . $this->_apiKey;
00262 
00263         //  Add the request data to the Url...
00264         if ( is_array( $this->_requestMap ) && !empty( $subType ) && isset( $this->_requestMap[ $this->_apiToUse ] ) )
00265         {
00266             $_requestMap = $this->_requestMap[ $this->_apiToUse ][ $subType ];
00267             $_result = array( );
00268 
00269             //  Add any extra requestData parameters unchecked to the query string...
00270             foreach ( $_payload as $_key => $_value )
00271             {
00272                 if ( !array_key_exists( $_key, $_requestMap ) )
00273                 {
00274                     $_queryString .= '&' . $_key . '=' . urlencode( $_value );
00275                     unset( $_payload[ $_key ] );
00276                 }
00277             }
00278 
00279             //  Now build the url...
00280             foreach ( $_requestMap as $_key => $_mapping )
00281             {
00282                 //  Tag as done...
00283                 $_result[] = $_key;
00284 
00285                 //  Is there a default value?
00286                 if ( isset( $_mapping[ 'default' ] ) && !isset( $_payload[ $_key ] ) )
00287                     $_payload[ $_key ] = $_mapping[ 'default' ];
00288 
00289                 if ( isset( $_mapping['required'] ) && $_mapping['required'] && !array_key_exists( $_key, $_payload ) )
00290                 {
00291                     throw new CPSApiException(
00292                         Yii::t(
00293                             __CLASS__, 'Required parameter {param} was not included in requestData', array(
00294                             '{param}' => $_key,
00295                             )
00296                         )
00297                     );
00298                 }
00299 
00300                 //  Add to query string
00301                 if ( isset( $_payload[ $_key ] ) )
00302                     $_queryString .= '&' . $_mapping[ 'name' ] . '=' . urlencode( $_payload[ $_key ] );
00303             }
00304         }
00305         //  Handle non-requestMap call...
00306         else if ( is_array( $_payload ) )
00307         {
00308             foreach ( $_payload as $_key => $_value )
00309             {
00310                 if ( isset( $_payload[ $_key ] ) )
00311                     $_queryString .= '&' . $_key . '=' . urlencode( $_value );
00312             }
00313         }
00314 
00315         if ( $this->_debugLevel > 3 )
00316             CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, 'Calling onBeforeApiCall' );
00317 
00318         //  Handle events...
00319         $_event = new CPSApiEvent( $_url, $_queryString, null, $this );
00320         $this->onBeforeApiCall( $_event );
00321 
00322         if ( $this->_debugLevel > 3 )
00323             CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, 'Making request: ' . $_queryString );
00324 
00325         //  Ok, we've build our request, now let's get the results...
00326         $_response = PS::makeHttpRequest( $_url, $_queryString, $requestMethod, $this->_userAgent );
00327 
00328         if ( $this->_debugLevel > 3 )
00329             CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, 'Call complete');
00330 
00331         if ( $this->_debugLevel > 4 )
00332             CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, 'Response: ' . var_export( $_response, true ) );
00333 
00334         //  Handle events...
00335         $_event->setUrlResults( $_response );
00336         $this->onAfterApiCall( $_event );
00337 
00338         //  If user doesn't want JSON output, then reformat
00339         switch ( $this->_returnFormat )
00340         {
00341             case PS::OF_XML:
00342                 $_response = CPSTransform::arrayToXml( json_decode( $_response, true ), 'Results' );
00343                 break;
00344 
00345             case PS::OF_ASSOC_ARRAY:
00346                 $_response = json_decode( $_response, true );
00347                 break;
00348 
00349             default: // Naked
00350                 break;
00351         }
00352 
00353         //  Raise our completion event...
00354         $_event->setUrlResults( $_response );
00355         $this->onRequestComplete( $_event );
00356 
00357         //  Return results...
00358         return $_response;
00359     }
